metadata.description: Subscription ID is used to provide access path to the Key Vault

subscriptionID.defaultValue: Copy and Paste Subscription ID here. It is provided on the instructions OneNote page.

metadata.description: Current deployment supports top level domain name only, for example contoso.com, fabrikam.com etc
The name of the Administrator of the new VMs and Domain
The password for the Administrator account of the new VMs and Domain. If you do not change it, then it will look like this: Subscription#SUBSCRIPTIONID

existingVirtualNetworkName.defaultValue: Add existing vNet Name where this deployment will be deployed to

metadata.description: Specify the name for the vNet to whcih this server will be deployed.
Name of the existing VNET resource group

DomainControllersSubnetName.defaultValue: Add Subnet Name where DCs will be deployed in vNet -> BackEnd...

metadata.description: Name of the subnet in the virtual network you want to put this VM

RdsSubnetName.defaultValue: Add Subnet Name where RDS will be deployed in vNet -> PAWSubnet...

metadata.description: Name of the subnet in the virtual network you want to put this VM
The name of the Key Vault where secrets are stored
The name of the RG where Key Vault is stored

resources.comments: Deploy RDS CB and LS VM #1
resources.name: [variables('cb1VMDeployment')]

resources.comments: Deploy RDS GW and Web VM #2

resources.comments: Deploy RDCB and RDLS on CB VM

resources.comments: Deploy RDGW and RDWeb on GW VM
